title: Ticket #2560: Cmake ethtool header file detection
description: On CentOS 5.6 ethtool.h is not properly detected even if header file exists "/usr/include/linux/ethtool.h" (package kernel-headers is installed). This disable Wake On Lan detection from ethernet card.
attachments:
• 0001-Fix-cmake-ethtool-detection.patch 1355 bytes added by slebodnik on 2011-Oct-18 22:13:56 UTC.
    This patch fix ethtool detection on CentOS 5.6. Problem was that header file "linux/ethtool.h" depends on "linux/types.h".

    Similar problem (and solutions) was described in mail http://www.cmake.org/pipermail/cmake/2008-July/023161.html
